content: Need me to collect some branches?
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
Hoho, I'm terribly sorry,
I'll have to trouble you to make another trip.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
If there aren't many branches around, try this:
<color=#38b6c5>Press and hold the left mouse button</color> on trees to shake some branches loose,
          <size=30>You might even find some other surprises!</size>
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
Hoho, it's wonderful that you can help.
Using ingredients gathered by your own hands to brew tea,
perhaps it will make the tea taste more fragrant, hoho.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
One of the arts of tea drinking is knowing "just the right amount",
so regardless of which color zinnia it is,
I'll just take <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> flowers...
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
The amount is perfect,
Like the aroma of tea, it's "just right"!
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
I'll take this then.
You can do what you want with the rest.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
While you were helping collect marigolds,
I was sniffing arou...
I mean, I was conducting a thorough investigation.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content: Is it for making a fire?
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
This time, I need a favor from you.
Could you help me collect <color=#8AAB4B>10</color> <color=#8AAB4B>branches</color>?
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
Found a branch on the ground,
You can "use" it too.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content: Hoho, that's right, branches make a great source of fuel when you need to start a fire... generally speaking.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
It might be a bit redundant to explain again,
but picking up branches is just like gathering marigolds—
simply <color=#38b6c5>press F</color>.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content: Hoho~ You can bring me any color of zinnia you manage to collect!
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content: Hoho, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, it seems your zinnia gathering went smoothly...
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
...Oh, my bad!
I didn't expect that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> had already
collected all the branches?!
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本

content:
Could this be a tacit understanding? Hoho...
Perhaps, it's a peculiar kind of foresight.
I'm very grateful that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> prepared so thoroughly.
info: 采集树枝教学_主流程文本
